content:
| Nudge # | Young Adults/Students | Professionals | Retirees | Quieter Environment Seekers | Group Workout Enthusiasts |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 9 | Use tooltips to provide helpful hints for young adults, such as study-break workout ideas or campus fitness resources. | Offer tooltips with time-management tips, efficient workout suggestions, and professional networking opportunities. | Provide tooltips with age-appropriate fitness advice, low-impact exercise ideas, and senior-focused resources. | Share tooltips with advice on quieter workout times, equipment usage tips, and peaceful workout routines. | Present tooltips highlighting group class schedules, popular workouts, and community-building tips. |
| 10 | Highlight progress toward fitness goals, stress-relief achievements, and social connections for young adults. | Emphasize progress toward time-efficient workouts, work-life balance, and fitness milestones for professionals. | Showcase progress toward age-appropriate workouts, health improvements, and social connections for retirees. | Display progress in equipment-focused workouts, quieter workout times, and personal fitness goals for quieter environment seekers. | Illustrate progress in group class participation, social connections, and fitness achievements for group workout enthusiasts. |

These contextual nudges take into account the diverse needs and preferences of different Anytime Fitness members, such as young adults, professionals, retirees, quieter environment seekers, and group workout enthusiasts. By personalizing the nudges, Anytime Fitness can create a more engaging and supportive experience tailored to each member's unique fitness journey.
